code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import Header from'./header';import Menu from'./menu';import Profile from'./profile';import ModalName from'./modalName';import Search from'./search';import'../css/index.css';import'./menu';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[name,setName]=useState("unnamed");const[currentTab,setCurrentTab]=useState("profile");const[showModalName,setShowModalName]=useState("");const changeName=newName=>{setName(newName);};const openModalName=()=>{setShowModalName(true);};const closeModalName=()=>{setShowModalName(false);};const changeCurrentTab=tab=>{setCurrentTab(tab);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalName,{show:showModalName,onClose:closeModalName,currentName:name,changeName:changeName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{name:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"middleBlock",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{changeCurrentTab:changeCurrentTab}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Search,{currentTab:currentTab}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Profile,{name:name,openModalName:openModalName,currentTab:currentTab})]})]});}export default App;
